lines.text:
[Approaching Joe]
It's over.
What's over?
Life, my friend.
[He pulls out a knife and moves toward Joe]
I know the secret to Heaven.
Oh, yeah, what's that?
A girl with freckles on her tits.
I don't see any heartstoppers in here. Most of these broads still got the prime tag hanging from their nose.

[Michel walks by and catches their attention as she sits down with a older man]
Maybe she's his mother.
She's got 'born to screw' tattooed on her forehead.
Don't be bitter.
I know the secret to happiness.
What's that?
A girl with freckles on her tits.
I'm not a whore.
What?
I'm not a whore. I've never been with anyone except Losado.
So?
I'm not a whore.
[Eddie Jilette is pouring coffee in Stemkowski's coffee cup]
Don't drink my coffee from my cup, Jilette!
You're doin' reefer with the brothers or is your old lady on a moon cycle?
Why do you ask somethin' like that?
Cause once a month without fail you get bullshit philosophical with me.
Yeah, well, that's what happens when you get married, Eddie.

[to Jillette]
You look like stale pis!

[to Michel]
Every hooker's got a hard luck story.
